title: July 11th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: July 11th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Doja Cat & Noah Schnapp drama, Armie Hammer, Kardashian Family Update, Amber Heard & Johnny Depp Trial Update, + Gen Z and the minions
description:
We hope ya'll missed us! This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from Doja Cat's drama with Noah Schnapp to our usual Kardashian Family update and more. See below for the topics of the week:



Doja Cat

  • Doja Cat and Noah Schnapp Drama - Sharing of their DM convo related to Joseph Quinn



Armie Hammer

  • Armie Hammer - A Regular in Cayman Islands Resort Offices Selling Time Shares



Kardashian Family Update

  • North West held up a sign saying “STOP” so people would stop taking pictures of her at the Jean Paul Gaultier Haute Couture Show
  • Kim Kardashian finally comes clean about cosmetic procedures she’s had (by not really coming clean)



Amber Heard & Johnny Depp Trial Update

  • Amber Heard requesting a mistrial due to an incorrect juror 



Minions

  • Gen Z losing their shit for the new Minions Movie and getting banned from dressing up at movie theaters





Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
